courses_list.course_description:
* Teaches students to build creatively with LEGO bricks, preparing them for more complex builds and robotics. 
* Class may be administered online or in-person.

* Introduces students to the basics of electricity and circuits through projects using the Snap Circuits Jr. kit. 
* Class may be administered online or in-person.

* Teaches students the basics of building and programming robots using the VEX GO kit and Scratch-powered VEXcode blocks. 
* No experience needed to enroll in the class.
* Split into 1A and 1B classes, which can be taken in any order.
* In-person only.
